title: List of prime ministers of Canada - Wikipedia
snippet: The office was modelled after that which existed in the United Kingdom at the time of Confederation. John A. Macdonald was commissioned by the Viscount Monck on 24 May 1867 to form the first government of the Canadian Confederation.

title: Prime Ministers of Canada
snippet: This page provides general details on Canada's prime ministers since 1867.

title: Government Ministries and Prime Ministers of Canada Since 1867 - House of Commons Procedure and Practice, Third edition, 2017 - ProceduralInfo - House of Commons of Canada
snippet: ... The government of Sir John A. Macdonald resigned on November 5, 1873, as a result of the Canadian Pacific Railway scandal. On November 7, 1873, the Liberals under Alexander Mackenzie formed a government. ... Sir John Abbott served as Prime Minister from the Senate.
